job.title: Senior Software QA Engineer
job.description: pThe Senior QA Engineer sets quality standards and builds customer fulfillment by ensuring that Coinstar software performs as specified This position delivers outstanding results in the area of Quality Assurance QA through the design creation and delivery of intricate test cases in collaboration with business partners and various members of the Technology organizationppbrppstrongWhat youll dostrongpulliExecute endtoend test strategies against serverbased systems that provide services to Coinstar Kiosks running embedded systemsliliCollaborate with project teams to decompose requirements and ensure total coverage translating specifications into test design highlevel plan and test cases with traceability throughoutliliParticipate in and potentially drive project evaluations and daily standups sharing status on achievements and defects as well as detailing in test tools and any other required reportingliliResponsible for the full lifecycle of the test phase of a project from kickoff to production readiness including estimation and execution of regression functional and automated testingliliReplicate and understand production issues in test environments to help inform solutionsliliMotivate coach and mentor team members on standard methodologies and alignment to policy including acting as a point of escalation for more junior membersliliContribute to content and continuous improvement of QA metricsliliRemain current with emerging technologies influencing the future Coinstar landscapeliliRole model Coinstar proficiencies holding self and others accountableliulpbrppstrongEducation amp Experience strongpulliHigh school degree required college degree preferredlili8 years of software Quality Assurance engineering liliTesting on Software as a service SaaS and embedded systemsliliTesting on various platforms websites clientserver applications and backend web servicesliliAgile project management tools like Jira and RallyliliWorking with test harnesses test automation tools and industry standard CICD toolsliliTesting in cloudbased solutions like AWS and AzureliliTesting embedded systems or consumer electronic devices a huge plusliulpbrppstrongKnowledge Skills amp Abilities strongpulliFamiliarity with a major programming language C preferred C Java Python Ruby are preferredliliFamiliarity with Bitbucket Visual Studio Team City TFS Test Manager are a plusliliFamiliarity with testing tools such as TestComplete TestStudio Rational Robot liliFamiliarity with automation test frameworks such as Selenium TestNG Karate Cucumber liliOutstanding analytical and problemsolving skills fixing complex configuration issuesliliHigh degree of comfort working with fluid requirements and constraintsliulpbrppWe believe that continued good health financial security and worklife balance are important We offer a complete progressive benefits package including an outstanding healthcare plan 401k match immediately vested generous paid timeoff paid parental and adoption leave corporate matched giving and more In addition we have a casual and flexible work environment with work from home options ppbrppstrongEEO StatementstrongppWe are Coinstar because of our people We value and embrace their unique and diverse talents perspectives and experiences and strive to build an environment where each individual can bring their best self to work We are an Equal Opportunity Employer Coinstar will ensure that persons with disabilities are provided reasonable accommodations If reasonable accommodation is needed please contact our Human Resources team via AskHRcoinstarcom We believe diversity and inclusion makes us a better more innovative and successful company and we seek to recruit and retain a diverse talent pool Even if you do not meet every qualification we encourage you to applyppThis job description is not intended to be allinclusive Other responsibilities may be assigned to meet the ongoing needs of the organizationppbrp
